Description: IM Mastery Academy sells digital educational products and services focused on the teaching of skills in understanding financial markets
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Full Description: IM Mastery Academy sells digital educational products and services focused on the teaching of skills in understanding financial markets and the e-commerce sector, delivered online primarily through live interactive content and supported by a library of pre-recorded and app-based content. Based in New York, USA, IM academy was formed in 2013 by Christopher and Isis Terry to offer learning and education opportunities to adult students on a subscription model. IM academy’s objective was to provide its customers with accessible and interactive training to enable them to develop skills they could apply to their own trading. Initially IM academy focused on financial markets education but has since expanded its scope into learning modules that cover other areas such as social media and ecommerce. The primary products are learning modules known as academies. There are five distinct learning programs that are offered to customers to purchase via the im.academy website. An additional option is to bundle chosen academies (“Impowered”). The content of each academy is delivered by means of access to unlimited interactive online sessions with IML trainers called “Educators”, via a service which is called “goLive”. Each goLive session is offered in 13 languages on multiple days and at varied times to accommodate students in different time zones. Each session customarily lasts one hour and includes the opportunity for students to ask questions and enter into discussion with the Educator about the subject matter of study. Students can also access a library of pre-recorded video modules for each academy. All pre-recorded content is also available on mobile devices via the IM academy app. Education customers have unlimited online access provided their subscription is current; however, they are free to download pre-recorded and digital content from academies to keep for their later use even after their subscription is cancelled. In addition, IM academy offers TLX, a travel benefits membership programme which is not an educational product but gives members access to discounted travel and experiences including themed educational trips. Product pricing reflects the value and breadth of the content provided to customers. IM academy does not engage in providing trading signals, offer investment advice or provide trading facilities; nor does IM academy refer business to investment brokers or recommend firms of brokers to its academy customers. IM academy therefore has no information on how students actually invest or trade or whether they make a profit or loss in their trading activities. IM academy uses a multi-level marketing programme, involving independent business owners (IBOs) to sell its online educational services. Customers, who are not part of the multi-level structure, pay subscriptions for educational services. Commissions are paid only on customer subscriptions. No commissions are paid for recruitment or from any fees paid by participants in the multi-level programme. All IM academy IBOs are self-employed, independent contractors and not employees; as such they do not receive a salary and are paid only on the customer sales they make, or their sales teams make. IM academy does not accept anyone under the age of 18 as a customer or as an independent business owner. IM academy does not admit minors to its corporate events as attendees and does not allow minors to enroll as customers or IBOs. On enrollment both customers and IBOs are asked to attest that they are over the age of 18 before being able to enroll. Accounts found to be held by minors are terminated. Outside of not permitting minors to enroll, IM academy does not track the age of its customers or IBOs or event attendees. Their company mission includes encouraging personal development in its students and IBO. Positive mindset and self-discipline are characteristics that the founders of IM academy consider to be foundational to both learning and creating a business. Further IM academy has just launched a new academy program called MMX that offers personal development material and education.
Industry Groups: Education, Software

Full Description: A CGI Animation Company. Pixar began as the computer graphics project of the Computer Division at Lucasfilm Ltd, created in 1979. The Computer Division was led by Ed Catmull and the graphics project (soon called Pixar) was run by Alvy Ray Smith. Pixar was a hardware company developing highend image processing tools - in particular the Pixar 2D Frame Buffer. In 1984 they hired John Lasseter to help them produce their first animated film, primarily to demonstrate the power of their hardware. Over the years Lasseter created more animated shorts to demonstrate the Pixar, in 1986 creating Luxo Jr. Pixar was spun out of Lucasfilm and was purchased by [Steve Jobs](/person/steve-jobs) in 1986, at which point it became an independent company, although still a hardware company, and run by Ed Catmull and Alvy Ray Smith. Failing to grow the hardware business, they became increasingly dependent on revenue from their animated projects, first doing commercials. Eventually they made a deal with Disney to produce the first full-length feature film entirely in CG. Jobs was not very focused on Pixar, and was trying to sell it in the early 90s. But on the strength of early viewings of Toy Story, he instead took Pixar public. The rest is history. Pixar was acquired by [The Walt Disney Company](/organization/the-walt-disney-company) in 2006, making Jobs the largest shareowner in Disney.

Full Description: SURETLY offers people an absolutely new kind of investment alternative - "crowdvouching". Crowdvouching is the practice of financially securing a loan repayment by vouching monetary contributions from a large number of people. Unlike P2P lending, SURETLY users (vouchers) do not lend money directly to the borrowers but guarantee to repay the loan to the lender in case of borrower's default.  Vouchers act as a collective mind in order to determine whether to approve loans or not. Each voucher approval serves like an insurance of the loan capped at $10 USD per borrower. In order for the loan to be approved, the entire loan amount should be guaranteed by the big pool of vouchers.  SURETLY connects lenders, borrowers and vouchers providing the following benefits:  1. eliminating default risk for lenders while expanding the loan portfolio due to higher loan approval. 2. decreasing the loan interest rate for borrowers. 3. providing an investment opportunity for a market segment that was unable to invest before.
